mapper.select: select h.*,to_char(h.hor_dt_f,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') hor_dt_cf, to_char(h.hor_dt_l,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') hor_dt_cl, m.user_nm,m.ph_no,m.f_uid,e.etp_nm from hospitalorders h , member m ,enterprise e where h.etp_cd = (select etp_cd from enterprise where user_id=#{user_id}) and h.user_id=m.user_id and e.etp_cd = h.etp_cd
